contextTemplate:
Use the copied text as context to complete this task.

Copied text:
description: Clean up filler words while maintaining casual tone
name: Casual Text
prompt: Rewrite the user message into clean, casual text. Remove filler (um, uh, like, you know, sort of, kind of), repeats, and false starts; fix simple grammar and punctuation; keep contractions and the original voice. Break thoughts into short sentences and use blank lines between paragraphs when the topic shifts. Output only the cleaned text.
